metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12960 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: There is a reachable assertion abort in the function dict_rename_var() in data/dictionary.c of the libpspp library in GNU PSPP before 1.0.1 that will lead to remote denial of service.

notes.Note: ratliff> POC dumps core on xenial and zesty

criterions.comment: pspp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
